## Data Visualization Excellence {background-image="https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1551288049-bebda4e38f71?w=1920&h=1080&fit=crop&crop=center" background-opacity="0.1"}

::: {style="background: rgba(255,255,255,0.95); padding: 2rem; border-radius: 15px; box-shadow: 0 8px 32px rgba(0,0,0,0.1); margin: 1rem;"}

### Creating Impactful Visual Stories 📊

::: {.columns style="gap: 2rem; margin-top: 1.5rem; align-items: center;"}
::: {.column width="60%"}
**Design Principles**
- 📈 **Clarity First**: Remove chart junk, focus on data
- 🎨 **Consistent Colors**: Use brand colors strategically
- 📱 **Mobile-Ready**: Responsive charts for all devices
- ⚡ **Performance**: Fast loading, smooth interactions
- ♿ **Accessible**: Color-blind friendly palettes

**Tool Selection**
- **Tableau** for complex dashboards
- **Power BI** for Microsoft ecosystems
- **D3.js** for custom visualizations
- **Python/R** for statistical graphics
:::
